title: No Distractions
description: A Mozilla Firefox web extension that temporarily blocks distracting websites to help users focus.
abstract: With the temptation of checking social media's abundant content, it has become difficult to keep focus on our tasks. At least, that's how I feel. So I've created a web extension that redirects your browser whenever you try to visit social media websites to keep your attention focused on your tasks.
technologies: Mozilla Firefox, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS

title: DegreeInsight.io
description: A web application that lets students plan course roadmaps toward their graduation. (Senior project; developed as a team of fellow senior students.)
abstract: It is an unfortunate common occurence among undergraduate students to have their expected graduation date be delayed due to not getting their desired classes because of unforeseen reasons such as course impaction, pre-requisites, or availability. DegreeInsight.io aims to help students plan their course roadmaps while making them aware of such pitfalls to avoid them.
technologies: TypeScript, Angular, Material, Adobe XD, HTML, CSS, Agile
responsibilities: Collaborated with a team of senior university students to develop a web application that helps students plan out when to take courses in order to graduate in time.
Deliberated with teammates to identify needed technologies to formulate thetech stack to be used.
Designed UI/UX mockups and prototypes to provide visual representation during development.
Architected and implemented responsive front-end UI interfaces for various feature specs such as student profile and term planning dashboard.

title: Spartan Agenda
description: A web application that lets user create to-do lists to organize their tasks.
abstract: College students are faced with juggling tasks and it can be overwhelming for the unexperienced. Spartan Agenda aims to help students organize their tasks using to-do lists.
technologies: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, Docker
responsibilities: Engineered RESTful APIs and utilized JSON Web Tokens and Spring Security to secure them.
Programmed a user authentication API complete with salting/hashing of passwords and credentials validation

title: Abode.city
description: A web application that simulates a hotel booking app. (Developed as a team)
abstract: In order to learn Agile Development and put it into practice, I teamed with 9 other software engineering students to develop an app that simulates a hotel booking site. This includes all functionalities that you expect from a hotel booking site such as hotel booking, hotel search, user accounts, etc.
technologies: JavaScript, React, Redux, NodeJS, MongoDB, Express, Material UI, HTML, CSS, Agile
responsibilities: Developed a web application that simulates a hotel booking website with a team of fellow engineering students.
Drafted UI mockups for the landing page, hotel search page, and city description pages.
Built the front-end for the hotel search and city description feature specs complete with search result filtering and page responsiveness.

title: Byte Drive
description: An iOS app for storing files and images in the cloud. (Developed as a team)
abstract: It is very easy to deplete your mobile device's storage space with media and apps. To circumvent this limitation, we developed an iOS app that lets users store files and other data into the cloud.

title: Text Encryptor
description: A web application that lets users encrypt/decrypt text files or input using simple crypto algorithms.
technologies: PHP, XAMPP, MySQL, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

title: Spartanstop.com
description: A web application that simulates an e-commerce grocery app.
abstract: In order to learn Agile Development and put it into practice, I teamed with 7 other software engineering students to develop an app that simulates an e-commerce grocery site. This includes all functionalities that you expect from an e-commerce grocery site such as item browsing, purchasing, user accounts, etc. Also includes a food recipe feature.
technologies: JavaScript, React, Redux, NodeJS, MongoDB, Express, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, Agile
responsibilities: Built the front-end of the search products by category and food recipes features.
Implemented the corresponding back-end support for the food recipes featurewhich queriesand servesdata from a MongoDB instance.
